name: MalignantNeoplasmOfPancreas
title: Malignant Neoplasm of Pancreas
description: OP-10 is the measure ID associated with the codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-9 codes associated with malignant neoplasm of pancreas.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have malignant neoplasm of head of pancreas, body of pancreas, of tail of pancreas, pancreatic duct, endocrine pancreas, other parts of pancreas, overlapping sites of pancreas, pancreas, unspecified and malignant neoplasm of pancreas.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-9 codes associated with malignant neoplasm of head of pancreas, body of pancreas, of tail of pancreas, pancreatic duct, endocrine pancreas, other parts of pancreas, overlapping sites of pancreas, pancreas, unspecified and malignant neoplasm of pancreas are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Malignant neoplasms that are not associated with the pancreas are excluded from the value set. Codes captured in systems other than ICD-9 are also excluded from the value set.)
